name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-js-pi-canvas
title: PiCanvas - Tabbed Page Sections
shortDescription: Organize SharePoint web parts into flexible tabbed layouts with permission-based visibility and templates.
longDescription: PiCanvas is a SharePoint Framework web part that organizes web parts into a clean tabbed interface.
Features include permission-based tab visibility, multiple tab styles (default, pills, underline, boxed), vertical layouts, theme auto-detection, and a template system for consistent deployments.
Originally based on Mark Rackley's Modern Hillbilly Tabs, modernized for SPFx 1.21.1 with TypeScript 5.3, ESLint, and fast-serve.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.

references.name: Original Modern Hillbilly Tabs
references.description: The original SPFx 1.13.1 implementation by Mark Rackley that PiCanvas builds upon.
